title: ATUM Barcodes meta box
intro:
Here you will see the barcode generated for this product.

It can be distinct to the above example depending on your configuration.
If you don't see any, make sure to fill in the barcode field and save the product.

title: Barcode field
intro: This is the barcode field. You can enter any barcode you want here.

title: Screen Options
intro: From the Screen Options tab, you can enable or disable the display of the barcodes meta box.
